Playing outdoor activities like frisbee can benefit these young men in several ways:

1. Physical Fitness: Outdoor activities often involve a lot of movement, which can help improve cardiovascular health, build muscle strength, and enhance flexibility and coordination.

2. Mental Health: Engaging in physical activity releases endorphins, the body’s natural mood lifters. It can also help reduce stress, anxiety, and depression.

3. Social Skills: Playing games with others can help develop important social skills like communication, teamwork, and sportsmanship. It’s a great way to make new friends and strengthen existing relationships.

4. Enjoyment: Of course, one of the main benefits of playing any game is having fun! Enjoying the game can make players feel happier and more satisfied in their daily lives.

5. Connection with Nature: Playing outdoors can also provide an opportunity to connect with nature, which has been shown to have various health benefits, including improved mood and reduced stress levels.

Remember, the most important thing is to enjoy the activity and have fun! 😊
